profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2013-09-13T21:15-0400

did.unittitle: Fieldwork in the Menominee language
did.physdesc: 11 sound cassettes (10 hr., 11 min.) : analog, 1 7/8 ips, stereo.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: This material has access restrictions. Please consult a curator for details.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Presented by Rebecca Kavanaugh. This material was recorded with the assistance of a Phillips Fund grant.

did.unittitle: Group discussion of commonly-used verbs and phrases

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: A multi-part, day-long group workshop session to write down commonly-used Menominee verbs, phrases, and other vocabulary for the purposes of creating teaching material. Some of the participants are not identifiable.

did.unittitle: Group discussion of commonly-used verbs and phrases

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: A multi-part, day-long group workshop session to write down commonly-used Menominee verbs, phrases, and other vocabulary for the purposes of creating teaching material. From 15:08 to 20:00 there is a discussion of local politics and the role of teaching Menominee language and culture. Some of the participants are not identifiable.

originalsloc.head: Existence and Location of Originals note
